following error as a popup

Please give details of where to download this plugin as we need to be sure 
that we are not violating the Eclipse user agreement by looking at it here.
Awaiting details of how to setup my workspace for this.

This problem has been addressed by the community - see 
http://membres.lycos.fr/resinforeclipse/

Created an attachment (id=4649)
resin plugin used when the bug was found

Hi Tod, 

I used this plugin for eclipse when I reported the bug.  

When I used the one sent by u, I do not even get the option to create a new
Resin Java Project.

Thanks,
Harsha
Reopening to investigate with specific case.

The error we get from this wizard is the one below.

Looking at this wizard class the problem is that it subclasses an internal JDT 
wizard which likely changed for 2.1.0 (there is no API contract if you use an 
internal class). The implementors of this wizard should not subclass internal 
classes as they are subject to change at any time.

Moving to JDT for comment. 

Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError:

The is nothing we can/will do since, as Tod pointed out, the community plug-in 
uses internal JDT/UI API.
